sol-city.name: Mira Vale
sol-city.description: Polished, measured, slight condescension. Professional bureaucrat who believes in the system.
sol-city.suggestedVoice: Sarah - Young adult woman with confident and warm, mature quality and a reassuring, professional tone. Perfect for the polished bureaucrat.

sol-refinery.name: Rex Calder
sol-refinery.description: Gruff, working-class, direct. No-nonsense foreman who has seen it all.
sol-refinery.suggestedVoice: Eric - Smooth tenor pitch from a man in his 40s, classy. Good for the gruff but experienced foreman.

aurum-fab.name: Dr. Elin Kade
aurum-fab.description: Clinical, precise, emotionally detached. Scientist first, human second.
aurum-fab.suggestedVoice: Matilda - Professional woman with pleasing alto pitch, upbeat but can be modulated for clinical detachment.

greenfields.name: Sana Whit
greenfields.description: Warm, earthy, quietly fierce. Farmer who fights with patience and resolve.
greenfields.suggestedVoice: Alice - Clear and engaging, friendly woman with British accent. Warm and professional fits the earthy farmer.

ceres-pp.name: Ivo Renn
ceres-pp.description: Dry, calculating, subtle menace. Every word is deliberate.
ceres-pp.suggestedVoice: Daniel - Strong British voice perfect for professional broadcast. Formal and deliberate, perfect for calculating menace.

freeport.name: Kalla Rook
freeport.description: Street-smart, charming, hint of mischief. The friendly merchant who knows everything.
freeport.suggestedVoice: Laura - Young adult female with sunny enthusiasm and quirky attitude. Sassy fits the street-smart merchant.

drydock.name: Chief Harlan
drydock.description: Blue-collar, loyal, weathered. Union man through and through.
drydock.suggestedVoice: Brian - Middle-aged man with resonant and comforting tone. Perfect for the weathered union man.

hidden-cove.name: Vex Marrow
hidden-cove.description: Dangerous charm, playful threat. Every smile has teeth.
hidden-cove.suggestedVoice: Callum - Deceptively gravelly, yet unsettling edge. Perfect for dangerous charm with playful threat.
